title: 012 - March Sadness Bracket Reveal Part 1
description: On today's episode of The Pod, the boys unveil part of their 2020 March Sadness bracket as we try to do something to entertain ourselves as the Coronavirus situation gets crazier and crazier. Today, the Stooge and Hopelessness Regional's are revealed and the guys take a look at the matchups and see who the experts are predicting to move on into the next round of the tournament. Those matchups will be in a poll on @ThePodPMI on Twitter so all of you can weigh in and we can properly crown a March Sadness 2020 Champion. As always, send questions to @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter or tune-in in the interim as we record the show live on https://www.youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow. Stay safe out there folks. Enjoy
dc:creator: The Pod
